title: Beyond Stubborn: Strategies for Changing Closed Minds
description: Ask questions, be patient, and embrace incrementalism, says Wharton School Professor Jonah Berger.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Ask questions, be patient, and embrace incrementalism, says Wharton School Professor Jonah Berger.
